sentence: Except in cases of self-defense, the use of force against another person is unlawful.
label: exception

sentence: This rule does not apply where the act was carried out under lawful authority.
label: exception

sentence: An employer may dismiss an employee without notice only in cases of gross misconduct.
label: exception

sentence: A tenant may withhold rent only if the premises are uninhabitable and notice has been given.
label: exception

sentence: No liability arises where the damage is caused solely by an unforeseeable natural event.
label: exception

sentence: Except as otherwise provided by law, personal data shall not be disclosed to third parties.
label: exception

sentence: This provision does not apply to information that is already publicly available.
label: exception

sentence: A search may be conducted without a warrant only in exigent circumstances.
label: exception

sentence: Evidence is inadmissible unless it falls within a recognized exception.
